column4: Also, I want to copy a dvd to hard drive. I then want to scrunch it down smaller, say to avi.  -- AND I want to move some avi files I have to a dvd -> so that it can be read by a dvd player )to play at a friend's house. Advice and help please!

devede does not come with instructions. The web pages are spanish but still dont have spanish instructions.  --- blueskaj .. I dont understand dvd::rip  unless you mean rest in peace and that wouldnt be helpful, lol. :D
well they finally changed it to dvdrip , look in your package manager
